game.title: Ragnarok's Lost Relic
game.objective: Retrieve the lost relic of Ragnarok from the ancient temple.
game.description: The powerful relic of Ragnarok has been stolen from its resting place by a group of rogue adventurers. Retrieve it from the ancient temple before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting +10 strength and a rare gemstone

task.objective: Gather information about the relic's location.
task.description: Sneak into the local tavern and eavesdrop on the conversation between the rogue adventurers to gather more information about the relic's whereabouts.
task.location: The Dragon's Rest Tavern in town square

task.objective: Retrieve a map leading to the temple.
task.description: Meet with a local cartographer who may have information about the relic's location. He can be found in his shop near the town market.

task.objective: Enter the ancient temple and retrieve the relic.
task.description: Navigate through the treacherous temple ruins, avoiding traps and battling hostile creatures. The relic is located in the central chamber, but beware of the temple's deadly guardians.

task.objective: Return to Ragnarok and hand over the relic.
task.description: Return to Ragnarok's tower and present him with the retrieved relic. He will reward you for your bravery and ingenuity.
